entry.title: I Will Defy Gravity Simply To Hold You One More Time
entry.summary:
Author: Queen_of_the_northern_light

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 48,133Chapters: 8/8Kudos: 32

Summary: During NASA‚Äôs latest Mars Mission an astronaut becomes stranded on the desolated planet after his team assumes him dead, and he must rely on his ingenuity to find a way to signal to Earth that he is alive and to survive a potential rescue. Hope and survival really aren‚Äôt on his side, but he has a family to make it back to. Death isn‚Äôt an option; however fatal his situation may be, he is willing to defy everything known to man for a chance of holding the love of his life one more time. And Christopher, he desperately wants to return to his son as well.¬†Or in which Eddie refuses to die, if he must fight the very knowledge of reality and physics, so be it. The whole world is watching as he and Buck literally change the definition of Star-Crossed Lovers for the rest of eternity.

entry.title: Evan Buckley Off-Shift Adventures
entry.summary:
Author: Spacers24

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 66,140Chapters: 21/?Kudos: 1,253

Summary: After over-hearing the 118 saying he should get a life outside of the firehouse, Buck swears that he will make a life for his own outside the firehouse and it's crew. His idea to achieve that is trying out activity he can do during his free time. He never expected that this would lead to him making some new friends. And one things for sure, his new friends and routine is sure to never leave his life boring ever again.

entry.title: stuck in the wake of it all
entry.summary:
Author: rayyo

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 33,667Chapters: 5/?Kudos: 76

Summary: ‚ÄúI don‚Äôt need anyone to see me like this.‚Äù----Evan Buckley knew that death came with the job-- how could something so inevitable be anything other than a shadow. What he didn't expect was the way this particular death, and the injury that came with it, would affect his life. The harder he tries to keep it together, the further he slips. His physical pain and emotional turmoil are slowly unraveling him, and while his friends and family try their best to help, can you really save someone who doesn't want to be saved?

entry.title: Extended Family In High Places
entry.summary:
Author: centeast

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 58,871Chapters: 5/?Kudos: 317

Summary: Eddie Diaz has just started at the 118 and is cousins to Alex and June Claremont Diaz, also known as the First Son of the United States and First Daughter of the United States. Eddie's relationship with his cousins are introduced to the 118 early on. Buck and Eddie's relationship grows throughout and an event in DC brings them together. Buck is welcomed into the extended family and everyone realizes they're regular people in high profile jobs.Starts around 911 Season 2 and follows the series as best we can. We'll also be following the RWRB book more than the movie, but some elements from the movie may slip in depending on the situation.This was inspired by our mutual adoration of 911 and Red, White and Royal Blue. Fans of 911 who are not aware of RWRB, we highly recommend reading the book and watching the movie. It is a cute rom-com book and the movie is good, too. And those RWRB fans, who do not know of 911, check it out! 6 seasons and still going strong. Although, we both have differing reasons as to why we watch. But you can blame Centeast for the RWRB fandom adoration! She introduced SapphireEJ when the book first came out!

entry.title: The Christmas Wish A Ryliver Special
entry.summary:
Author: villayuly1987

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 4,448Chapters: 8/10Kudos: 3

Summary: Oliver Leon Jones grows up in London and joins the UK acting union. He registers professionally as Oliver Jones. His career moves forward. His personal life stalls. Dating feels empty. He wants a partner who understands him. On Christmas Day 2017, he makes a quiet wish for a best friend who feels right. His manager laughs. Life moves on. A new job changes his path. Oliver joins 9-1-1, created by Ryan Murphy, Brad Falchuk, and Tim Minear. On his first day on set, he meets Ryan Anthony Guzman. The connection hits fast. Ryan brings confidence, warmth, and familiarity Oliver has missed for years. The story follows Oliver as work blurs into something personal. Friendship grows under studio lights and long days. Attraction builds behind closed doors. A Christmas wish turns real, with joy, risk, and consequences Oliver never planned for.

entry.title: Dress for the Job
entry.summary:
Author: rdyca81
